title: Joshua Fuller CV
text:
Versatile accountant and data analyst focusing on driving workplace efficiency and delivering meaningful insights. I combine detail-oriented accounting knowledge with technical proficiency in tools like Excel, SQL, and Python to generate actionable results and support informed decision-making.




Bachelor of Science: Accounting
September 2022 – April 2026
Brigham Young University – Idaho, Rexburg, ID

Senior-year student with completed Auditing and Intermediate Accounting I and II coursework
Practice preparing balance sheets, income statements, and general ledgers
Study Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) and Generally Accepted Auditing Standards (GAAS)






Data Analytics: Advanced Excel, VBA, Power BI, ChatGPT-4
Programming Languages: Python, Pandas, SQL
Software Proficiencies: Microsoft Office (Word, PowerPoint, Outlook), and Microsoft Teams





Accessibility Specialist
September 2023 - Present
Brigham Young University-Idaho, Rexburg, ID

Maintain detailed spreadsheets for over 100 courses, tracking accessibility issues
Conduct one-on-one training sessions with 15–30 students per month to analyze and fulfill student needs
Worked independently to leverage AI tools to automate tasks, increasing audit efficiency by 20%
Follow through with students and team members to cultivate effective relationships and enhance student experience





Member, Data Science Society
September 2024 - Present
Brigham Young University-Idaho, Rexburg, ID

Collaborate with a team to migrate an unstructured 40-sheet Excel database to a streamlined, SQL-based model
Utilize web scraping techniques to help collect weather data for a separate organization

Leadership Member, Accounting Society
January 2024 – April 2024
Brigham Young University-Idaho, Rexburg, ID

Strengthened the society’s national presence by executing targeted LinkedIn outreach to alumni and professionals
Managed the official LinkedIn page, promoting events and connecting with industry experts

Volunteer Missionary
June 2017 – June 2019
Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, Indianapolis, Indiana

Helped lead technology adoption initiatives to volunteers and train interested parties
Guided group of 7-9 other missionaries, enhancing their skills through goal setting and coaching






Learning Spanish via a language app

Cooling, power series, optics, alchemy, planetary motions, apples.
